content: विशुद्धिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Purification; तदंगसंसर्गमवाप्य कल्पते ध्रुवं चिताभस्मग्जो विशुद्धये <ls>Ku. 5. 79</ls>, <ls>Bg. 6. 12</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 69</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 54.</ls> {@--2@} Purity, complete purity; हेम्नः संलक्ष्यते ह्यग्नौ विशुद्धिः श्यामिकापि वा <ls>R. 1. 10</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 48.</ls> {@--3@} Correctness, accuracy. {@--4@} Rectification, removal of error. {@--5@} Similarity, equality. {@--6@} (In <ab>alg.</ab>) A subtractive quantity.
